com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db

Interface ODatabaseSchemaAware<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, OBackupable, ODatabase<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ODatabaseDocument, ODatabaseDocumentInternal, ODatabaseObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ODatabaseDocumentTx, ODatabaseDocumentTxPooled, ODatabasePojoAbstract, OObjectDatabaseTx, OObjectDatabaseTxPooled

    public interface ODatabaseSchemaAware<T>
extends ODatabase<T>
    Generic interface for record based Database implementations with schema concept.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli
